com.ashwin.fri.pacman.display

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.display.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedSprite

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    A sprite represents a location within a sprite sheet.
    Author:
    ashwin

      • getDimensions

        public java.awt.Rectangle getDimensions()
        This method returns a rectangle defining the location of this sprite within the sprite sheet. It is used to render the sprite by the graphics engine.
        Returns:
        location of the sprite within sprite sheet
